long_description: The PRO-TEC Gel Force ankle support brace uses thick gel to help stabilize your ankle after a sprain. Gel compression holds in inflammation and promotes circulation to help healing. Gel offers comfortable, ankle-conforming stabilization. Elastic fabric features built-in 4-way stretch for easy on and off. Medial and lateral steel stays increase stability.
short_description: The PRO-TEC Gel Force ankle support brace uses thick gel to help stabilize your ankle after a sprain. Gel compression holds in inflammation and promotes circulation to help healing.
